personal.effect: Adjacent Allies deal +3 damage and take 1 less damage.
If unit is adjacent to the Divine Dragon, grants Crit+5 during combat to both of them.
If unit is adjacent to the Divine Dragon, grants Hit+10 during combat to both of them.
If unit is adjacent to the Divine Dragon, grants Avo+10 during combat to both of them.
If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Str+2 for 1 turn.
When unit recovers HP using an item, grants Str+2 for 1 turn.
When an ally joins a chain attack in this unit's combat, unit deals +2 damage.
Recovery items used by allies within 2 spaces heal +50% HP.
If two female allies are adjacent within 2 spaces, this unit takes 2 less damage during combat.
If a male and a female ally are adjacent within 2 spaces, unit deals +2 damage during combat.
Grants unit enhanced stat growth when leveling up.
If unit initiates combat, grants Hit+15 to unit and foe if foe is able to counterattack.
If no other units are within 1 space of unit or foe, grants Hit+20 at a cost of Avo-10 during combat.
If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Res+2 for 1 turn.
When an ally within 2 spaces is attacked, grants Str+3 to unit for 1 turn.
When this unit uses a healing item, adjacent allies also recover the same amount of HP.
If there is an ally within 1 space, grants Hit/Avo+10 at a cost of Crit-10 to unit.
While unit occupies terrain that provides Avo bonus, grants Crit+15.
If unit's HP is 50% or less at start of combat, grants Hit/Avo+20 during combat.
During combat with a foe who was also unit's most recent opponent, grants Hit+20.
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Avo-10 on foe during combat.
If foe initiates combat, inflicts Hit-10 on that foe during combat.
When unit uses a healing staff, grants range +1.
If foe is male, inflicts Avo-20 on that foe during combat.
If foe is male, inflicts Hit-20 on that foe during combat.
May obtain 500G when unit defeats a foe. Trigger %=Lck.
If unit is equipped with a weapon of lower level than foe's, grants Crit+20 during combat.
Inflicts Crit-5 on foes within 3 spaces.
When 2 or more female allies are within 2 spaces, grants Hit/Avo+5 to unit and those allies.
If unit's HP is not at max after combat, grants Crit+10 as long as unit's HP stays below max.
During combat with a foe who was also unit's most recent opponent, inflicts Crit-10 on that foe.
On eating a packed lunch, unit may obtain another of the same item. Trigger %=Lck.
Grants a bonus to Hit and Avo equal to 3× the number of allies and foes within 2 spaces.
At start of turn, allies within 2 spaces of unit recover 10% of their max HP.
Adjacent allies deal +1 damage and take 3 less damage.
If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Def+2 for 1 turn.
If foe initiates combat against Nil/Rafal, grants Crit+10 to unit for 1 turn.
When an ally within 2 spaces defeats a foe, grants Crit+10 to unit for 1 turn.
When unit defeats a foe, grants Hit+20 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.
When there are more foes than allies within 3 spaces, grants Avo+20.
If foe initiates combat and unit is adjacent to an ally, unit takes 2 less damage.
When an ally within 2 spaces defeats a foe, grants Crit+10 to unit for 1 turn.

class.effect: Unit's engage meter is shortened one step.
During combat, may prevent 50% of physical damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.
During combat, may add half of Str to magic damage or half of Mag to all other damage. Trigger %=Dex.
Unit may recover HP=50% damage dealt. Trigger %=Dex.
While making an attack, may ignore half of foe's Def/Res. Trigger %=Dex.
When attacking with a tome, unit may deal extra damage = half of foe's Mag. Trigger %=Dex.
When unit uses a staff, may not consume a use. Trigger %=Dex.
While making a physical attack, may calculate damage with 150% of Def instead of Str. Trigger %=Dex.
When countering, unit may deal extra damage = half of damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.
If unit uses Dance, grants Dex/Spd/Lck+3 to target for 1 turn.
At the start of each turn, unit's engage meter is filled by 1.
When attacked with an engage attack, prevents 20% of damage.
At start of player phase, fills adjacent allies' engage meters by 1.
When attacking with a sword, damage is calculated using average of foe's Def and Res.
Use to move to the opposite side of an adjacent ally.
If unit initiates combat with a knife, inflicts Mov-2 on foe for 1 turn.
When unit is healed by a staff, all adjacent allies also recover 50% of the HP that the unit recovered.
Unit can target itself with healing staves.
If unit initiates combat with a tome, grants Atk equal to the number of adjacent allies with tomes.
If unit initiates combat with a physical attack against a foe armed with magic or vice versa, grants Spd+3 during combat.
If unit's HP is at max while unit makes a chain attack, unit attacks twice.
Use to attack an adjacent foe, then move to the space opposite that foe.
If unit initiates combat while an ally is on the opposite side of the foe, always follow up (if weapon allows).
If unit's HP is 11 or more and an adjacent ally is broken after combat, sacrifices 10 HP and removes the break status from that ally.
When making a smash attack, push the target 2 spaces instead of 1.
Unit deals +50% damage against broken foes.
Grants Crit+10 during combat with a foe that can't counter.
If unit initiates combat without moving first, grants Hit+40 during combat.
Unit's space and adjacent spaces have a movement cost of 1 for allies.
If unit initiates combat from a space a foe cannot enter, grants Spd+5 during combat.
Use to switch places with an adjacent ally.
If unit is between an ally and a foe, reduces damage to unit by 3 during combat with that foe.
Foes do not block this unit's movement.
Inflicts -1 to the engage meters of foes within 2 spaces at the start of the turn.
Use to deposit or retrieve weapons and items.
Use to peform a guaranteed-hit, area-of-effect attack at the start of the next player phase. Unit loses equipped weapon.
At start of turn, applies frost to terrain within 2 spaces of unit.
Allies of the same class as unit within 3 spaces participate in chain attacks.
At start of turn, applies miasma to terrain within 2 spaces of unit.

sync.effect: If the unit initiates combat, grants Avo+15 during combat. Avo increases with high Spd.
If the unit initiates combat, grants Avo+30 during combat. Avo increases with high Spd.
If unit’s attack breaks foe, unit makes an extra attack at 50% damage.
At start of player phase, if HP is 20% or less, restores 20% of unit’s max HP.
At start of player phase, if HP is 30% or less, restores 30% of unit’s max HP.
At start of player phase, if HP is 40% or less, restores 40% of unit’s max HP.
If a Corrupted attacks unit, deals 10% of damage taken back to foe.
If a Corrupted attacks unit, deals 30% of damage taken back to foe.
If a Corrupted attacks unit, deals 50% of damage taken back to foe.
If a non-Corrupted foe attacks unit, deals 50% of damage taken back to foe.
When equipped with a tome, if unit’s HP is 2 or more, unit loses 1 HP at start of combat and deals +2 damage during combat.
When equipped with a tome, if unit’s HP is 2 or more, unit loses 1 HP at start of combat and deals +3 damage during combat.
When unit eats a packed lunch, its engage meter is maxed out.
Unit can move 2 spaces after acting.
Unit can move 3 spaces after acting.
Grants Atk+1 to first attack during combat for each space unit moved before attacking. (Max +10)
Grants Atk+1 to first attack during combat for each space unit moved before attacking.
Grants immunity to freeze.
When unit has weapon advantage, unit takes 3 less damage.
When unit has weapon advantage, unit takes 5 less damage.
When unit has weapon advantage, unit takes 7 less damage.
If unit’s HP is 25% or less and foe initiates combat, unit can counter before foe’s first attack.
If unit’s HP is 50% or less and foe initiates combat, unit can counter before foe’s first attack.
If unit’s HP is 75% or less and foe initiates combat, unit can counter before foe’s first attack.
If unit had 30% HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.
If unit had 20% HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.
If unit had 10% HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.
If unit had 2 HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.
Use to move 1 space toward a foe that is 2 spaces away and attack.
If unit initiates combat with a Spd advantage of 9 or more, unit’s follow-up (if possible) occurs before foe can counterattack.
If unit initiates combat with a Spd advantage of 7 or more, unit’s follow-up (if possible) occurs before foe can counterattack.
If unit initiates combat with a Spd advantage of 5 or more, unit’s follow-up (if possible) occurs before foe can counterattack.
Grants a stacking Spd+2 each time unit initiates combat and defeats a foe. Bonus lasts for the rest of the battle. (Max +10)
If unit initiates combat with a physical attack, deals extra damage=20% of foe’s Def. Useable when Eirika is active.
If unit initiates combat with a physical attack, deals extra damage=30% of foe’s Def. Useable when Eirika is active.
If unit initiates combat, unit recovers HP=30% of damage dealt. Useable when Ephraim is active.
If unit initiates combat, unit recovers HP=50% of damage dealt. Useable when Ephraim is active.
If unit initiates combat, unit deals extra damage=20% of foe’s Def with physical attacks and recovers HP=30% of damage dealt. Only useable when Engaged. Replaces Lunar Brace and Solar Brace.
If unit initiates combat, unit deals extra damage=30% of foe’s Def with physical attacks and recovers HP=50% of damage dealt. Only useable when Engaged. Replaces Lunar Brace and Solar Brace.
Use to switch Emblems and swap between Lunar Brace/Gentility and Solar Brace/Bravery for all allies.
Unit takes 3 less damage. Useable when Eirika is active.
Unit takes 5 less damage. Useable when Eirika is active.
Unit deals +3 damage. Useable when Ephraim is active.
Unit deals +5 damage. Useable when Ephraim is active.
Unit takes 3 less damage and deals +3 damage. Only useable when Engaged. Replaces Gentility and Bravery.
Unit takes 5 less damage and deals +5 damage. Only useable when Engaged. Replaces Gentility and Bravery.
Break destructible terrain in a single blow when using Destroy.
If unit’s HP is 75% or less after combat, grants Def/Res+5 as long as unit’s HP stays below 75%.
If unit’s HP is 75% or less after combat, grants Def/Res+7 as long as unit’s HP stays below 75%.
Use to move an adjacent ally to the opposite side of unit.
At start of combat, for each HP the unit has lost, grants Crit+1 during combat. (Max +30)
Unit can equip staves up to level C.
Unit can equip staves up to level B.
Unit can equip staves up to level A.
When unit heals an ally with a staff, unit also recovers HP=50% of the amount healed.
Grants immunity to silence.
Unit participates in chain attacks as if it were a backup unit.
If unit is able to chain attack, unit will do so when allies attack foes unit could reach by moving. Trigger %=35.
If unit is able to chain attack, unit will do so when allies attack foes unit could reach by moving. Trigger %=70.
Grants a bonus to Avo that increases with unit’s support level with adjacent allies. (Max +90)

Use to add a special effect to certain spaces.
Dragon: Choose any Vein effect.
Backup: Creates stone pillars that increase Def/Res.
Cavalry: Creates water that decreases Avo.
Covert: Creates fog that increases Avo. (Corrin)
Covert: Creates smoke that decreases Def/Avo. (Camilla)
Armored: Creates vines that grant immunity to break.
Flying: Creates healing glow that restores HP.
Mystical: Creates flames that inflict damage.
Qi Adept: Creates ice pillars that hinder movement. (Corrin)
Qi Adept: Creates ice floor that increases movement. (Camilla)
After unit acts or waits, restores 5 HP to adjacent allies and slightly increases support with them.
After unit acts or waits, restores 10 HP to adjacent allies and slightly increases support with them.
If unit initiates combat, inflicts -4 to all of foe’s basic stats after combat. (Penalties shrink by 1 each turn.)
Prevents damage from foes’ chain attacks against unit.
May turn a missed attack into a hit. Trigger %=30. Chance increases with high Lck.
May turn a missed attack into a hit. Trigger %=50. Chance increases with high Lck.
Grants 1.2× EXP modifier to unit and adjacent allies.
If unit finishes an action or waits next to an ally, may find an item and increase support with that ally. Trigger %=Lck.
Unit is Effective: Fell Dragon. Allies within 2 spaces with Effective: Dragon gain Effective: Fell Dragon.
Grants Hit/Avo+20 to unit and allies within 2 spaces that are synced or engaged with an Emblem.
Grants Hit/Avo+30 to unit and allies within 2 spaces that are synced or engaged with an Emblem.
Neutralizes Effective against this unit.
If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to Crit and Ddg equal to 2× the number of allies who have acted this turn.
Grants unit enhanced stat growth when leveling up. [Adds +15% to final growth rates.]
At start of player phase, if there are allies adjacent to unit, grants Def/Res+3 to unit and those allies for 1 turn.
At start of player phase, if there are allies adjacent to unit, grants Def/Res+5 to unit and those allies for 1 turn.
If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, restores 20 HP and heals status effects.
If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, restores 30 HP and heals status effects.
If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, restores 40 HP and heals status effects.
If unit initiates combat, halves chance of receiving critical hit from foe.

Effects change based on synced Emblem.
Flame Gambit: Use when synced with Edelgard to attack a foe, then set the target foe’s space and nearby spaces on fire.
Shield Gambit: Use when synced with Dimitri to negate damage from first attacks of ranged foes targeting unit in next enemy phase.
Poison Gambit: Use when synced with Claude to attack a foe, then poison target and all foes adjacent to it after combat.
At start of player phase, the Emblem will randomly switch to Edelgard, Dimitri, or Claude.
Increases unit’s earned experience by 20%.
If unit initiates combat using same weapon type as the synced Emblem, grants Atk+5. If engaged, grants Atk+5 regardless of weapon type.
If unit initiates combat using same weapon type as the synced Emblem, grants Atk+7. If engaged, grants Atk+7 regardless of weapon type.
If unit’s HP is 80% or more and foe initiates combat, unit will always follow up (if weapon allows).
If unit’s HP is 60% or more and foe initiates combat, unit will always follow up (if weapon allows).
When hit by a foe’s attack, grants Def+2 for a physical attack or Res+2 for a magical attack after combat. Lasts until end of battle, or until activated again.
When hit by a foe’s attack, grants Def+3 for a physical attack or Res+3 for a magical attack after combat. Lasts until end of battle, or until activated again.
When making a physical attack, if an equipped weapon’s Wt exceeds unit’s Bld, adds excess as damage. (Max +5)
Use when HP is full to consume 20% of max HP and prevent foes from entering the 4 spaces diagonally adjacent to unit for 1 turn.
Use to make one chosen ally more likely to be targeted by enemies for 1 turn. Effect is removed after ally is targeted by or otherwise damaged by foes 3 times.
When using tomes, unit inflicts Def-3 with fire, Hit-20 with thunder, or Mov-2 with wind magic for 1 turn.
When unit deals Effective damage, deal +5 damage.
When unit deals Effective damage, deal +7 damage.
When attacking a broken foe with a tome, grants a chance the foe will remain broken. Chance increases with high Spd.
If unit initiates combat and lands a critical, deals 5 damage to foe after combat.
If unit initiates combat and lands a critical, deals 10 damage to foe after combat.
Cures poison at start of turn.
After unit acts or waits in flames, miasma, or similar terrain effect, unit clears effect and recovers 10 HP.
If unit initiates combat from terrain that provides an Avo bonus, foe cannot counterattack.
Use to grant adjacent allies +3 to all seven basic stats for 1 turn.
Use to grant allies within 2 spaces +3 to all seven basic stats for 1 turn.
While making a physical attack, critical hits deal increased damage.
If unit’s attack triggers a chain attack, increases chain attack accuracy to 90%.
If unit's HP is not full, adds 30% of lost HP to Atk.
If unit's HP is not full, adds 50% of lost HP to Atk.
Book of Worlds advances 1 stage (to max 5) for each consecutive round that unit uses Wait. Reverts to base stage if unit triggers the effect.
If unit initiates combat, freezes foe after combat.
If unit initiates combat, freezes foe and sets foe's space on fire after combat.
If unit initiates combat, deals 10 damage, freezes foe, and sets foe's space on fire after combat.
If unit initiates combat, restore HP equal to damage dealt during combat, then deals 10 damage, freezes foe, and sets foe's space on fire after combat.
If unit initiates combat, restore HP to self and adjacent allies equal to damage dealt during combat, then deals 10 damage, freezes foe, and sets foe's space on fire after combat.
When unit defeats a foe of a higher level, grants Lvl+1 until the end of battle. (Max +3)
Grants +20 SP for each defeated foe. Triggers even without a ring or bracelet equipped.

engage.effect: Unit performs an extra attack at 50% damage in combat.
Use to attack with magic at 50% damage. Use a second time to launch another 50% attack.
Grants Mov+5.
Grants Mov+3.
If foe initiates combat, unit counters with the best weapon available (in terms of range, weapon advantage, effective bonus, etc.).
Grants Lvl+5.
Grants Lvl+3.
Creates four illusory doubles that can make chain attacks with unit.
While engaged with Eirika, changes Lunar Brace to Eclipse Brace and Gentility to Blue Skies for all allies.
Unit takes 50% less damage, but sets unit’s Avo to 0.
Grants staff range +5 and area of effect +1.
Grants staff range +3 and area of effect +1.
Use to prevent first attacks on adjacent allies until your next turn. Trigger %=80.
If unit initiates combat, target foe and all foes within 1 space of it cannot move for 1 turn after combat.
Use to grant allies within 2 spaces a stat bonus based on user's type. Bonus lasts for 1 turn.
If unit initiates combat and defeats foe, grants engage partner +4 to all seven basic stats while engaged.
Unit transforms into and fights as a dragon while engaged. Grants +10 to max HP and +5 to Bld and all basic stats.

Enables use of Edelgard, Dimitri, or Claude’s Combat Art. Spends some remaining engage turns.
Edelgard Raging Storm: After combat, take another action. (Spend 3 turns.)
Dimitri Atrocity: Attack at double weapon’s Mt. (Spend 1 turn.)
Claude Fallen Star: Avoid foe’s attacks during next combat. (Spend 1 turn.)
If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+30% during combat.
When attacking with tomes, inflicts Res-20% on foe, and unit recovers 50% of damage dealt.
Grants Mov+2. Unit can cross terrain as if flying.
If unit initiates combat, Robin chain attacks. Grants Mag+10 while engaged.
Use to grant another action to an adjacent ally who has already acted. (Ally cannot move.)

engage_attacks.effect: Use to launch 7 consecutive sword attacks at 30% damage. Adjacent foe only.
Use to warp up to 10 spaces and make a powerful magic attack.
Use to warp up to 5 spaces and make a powerful magic attack.
Use to make a powerful magic attack, then warp somewhere else on the map.
Use to attack and move through a line of adjacent foes. Sword/lance only.
Use to attack once each with sword, lance, axe, and bow.
Use to attack adjacent foe and an area 3 spaces wide. Target area and the 2 rows beyond it are set on fire. Sword only.
Use to launch 5 bow attacks at 30% damage, up to range 10.
Use to make a sword attack followed by a lance attack from Ephraim on adjacent foe. Effective: Corrupted.
Use to grant Def/Res+5, but unit can’t counter for 1 turn. Next turn, attack a 2-space area, heal HP=30% of damage dealt. Sword/axe only.
Use to restore full HP to all allies, even those not under the player’s control. After use, unit’s HP=1.
Use to make a sword attack against an adjacent foe. All allies within 2 spaces chain attack.
Use to attack 3 spaces in a line, turning those spaces into water terrain.
Use to grant another action to all adjacent allies.
Use to grant another action to allies within 2 spaces.
Use to make two attacks against an adjacent foe with a sword and powerful magic beam.
Use to make a sword attack from the unit and engage partner followed by a magic beam attack against an adjacent foe.
Use to grant 1 ally a Revival Stone.
Use to grant 1 ally a Revival Stone. If ally is not synced, fully restore HP. If ally is synced, +3 to engage meter. If ally is engaged, restore engage turns.
Use to attack with Aymr, Areadbhar, and Failnaught at 50% damage.
Use to attack with Aymr, Areadbhar, and Failnaught at 50% damage. After combat, take another action.
Grants immunity to break. Foe cannot follow up. Unit follows up. Lasts 1 turn. Sword/axe only.
Grants immunity to break. Foe cannot follow up. Unit counters before foe’s first attack and follows up. Lasts 1 turn. Sword/axe only.
Use to attack foes in an area with fire, thunder and wind magic at 40% damage. Wind is effective: Flying.
Use to attack foes in an area with fire, thunder and wind magic at 40% damage. Wind is effective: Flying.
Use to deal damage to foes on certain spaces near unit and set those spaces on fire.
Use to deal damage to foes on certain spaces near unit and set those spaces on fire.
Use to attack with a magic sword. Magic attack that uses physical attack power. Swords only.
Use to attack with a magic sword. Magic attack that uses physical attack power. Swords only. Adjacent allies chain attack.
Use to summon a random unit.

bond_ring.effect: If foe initiates combat and if unit's HP is 50% or less, unit takes 5 less damage.
If unit initiates combat with a sword, grants Crit+10 during combat.
If unit initiates combat with a sword, foe may not counterattack. Trigger %=Lck.
If unit uses Thunder, Elthunder, or Thoron, deals +20% damage.
Unit recovers 5 HP each turn.
Grants a stacking Crit+1 each time unit initiates combat and defeats a foe. Bonus lasts for the rest of the battle. (Max +10)
Avoids foe's attack when unit would be defeated. Trigger %=Lck. (Max 50%)
When unit initiates combat with Thunder equipped, unit attacks twice. (Excludes Elthunder and Thoron.)
If unit uses Fire, Elfire, or Bolganone, deals +20% damage.
Grants Hit+20 while unit is equipped with a smash weapon.
Use to move 1 space away from adjacent ally and pull the ally along.
If unit initiates combat with Excalibur, deals +20% damage.
If unit initiates combat, attacks are guaranteed to hit. Trigger %=Dex
When landing a critical hit, instantly kills foe. Trigger %=30. (Excludes certain powerful foes.)
If unit initiates combat with Wind equipped, unit may attack twice. Trigger %=Dex. (Excludes Elwind and Excalibur.)
Use to push an adjacent ally with less Bld 1 space away.
May reduce foe's HP to 1. Trigger %=half of Dex. (Certain foes are immune to this effect.)
If dealing enough damage to defeat foe, instead leaves foe with 1 HP.
Adds +5% to trigger rate for all skills with trigger rates.
When unit heals an ally with a staff, restores +5 HP to target.
If unit's level is higher than foe's, grants Crit+10 during combat, and unit deals +2 damage and takes 2 less damage.
If unit initiates combat while foe's HP=100%, unit deals +2 damage and takes 2 less damage.
If unit initiates combat, freezes foe. Trigger % = total damage dealt.
Use to make an attack against an adjacent foe, then move 1 space away from that foe after combat.
If unit's HP=100%, grants range +1 with bows.
Grants Atk+2 to adjacent allies.
Grants Def+2 to adjacent allies for 1 turn at start of player phase.
Grants Res+2 to adjacent allies.

If unit’s HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has a lance equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.
If unit’s HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has an axe equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.
If unit’s HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has a tome equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.
If unit’s HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has a bow equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.
If unit’s HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has a knife equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.
If unit’s HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has an art equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Str-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Mag-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Def-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Spd-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Res-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)
When unit initiates combat, grants Spd+5 during combat.
When unit initiates combat, grants Crit+20 during combat.
When unit initiates combat, grants Hit+40 during combat.
When unit initiates combat, grants Avo+30 during combat.
When unit initiates combat, unit takes 10 less physical damage during combat.
When unit initiates combat, unit takes 20 less magical damage during combat.
If foe initiates combat, grants Str+6 during combat.
If foe initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat.
If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.
If foe initiates combat, grants Res+6 during combat.
If unit initiates combat, deals damage to foe equal to 20% of their max HP after combat.
If unit initiates combat, deals damage to foes within 2 spaces equal to 20% of their max HP after combat.
Unit deals +10 damage and takes +10 damage during combat.
If unit’s HP is 50% or less at the start of player phase, unit dies and deals 50% of its max HP to foes within 2 spaces.
When unit has weapon advantage, always follows up. When unit has disadvantage, foe always follows up.
If unit’s HP is 50% or less at start of combat, grants Crit+30 during combat.
When unit hits with an attack, inflicts -5 to foe’s engage meter.
Makes enemy chain attack accuracy always 30%. Reduces damage taken.
Makes enemy chain attack accuracy always 10%. Reduces damage taken.
Unit cannot be moved by skills, smash weapons, etc.
Reduces damage from effectiveness.
Negates damage from effectiveness.
Prevents unit from being broken.
Prevents unit from being broken. Reduces damage from effectiveness.
Prevents unit from being broken. Negates damage from effectiveness.
Foes do not earn EXP fighting this unit.
A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Prevents 20% of damage to unit.
A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Prevents 40% of damage to unit.
A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Prevents 60% of damage to unit.
A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Prevents 80% of damage to unit.
